content.rendered:
Yamazaki Whisky is Suntory’s flagship single malt whisky, from Japan’s first and oldest malt distillery, multi-layered with fruit and Mizunara aromas.

Spiritual and deep, made at Yamazaki Distillery, the soulplace of Japanese whisky, its signature multi-layered taste is highly praised by whisky connoisseurs all over the world. Now more difficult to find due to the Japanese whisky crisis.

excerpt.rendered:
Distillery Yamazaki
Age 25 Year Old
Whisky Origin Japan
Region Japan
ABV 43%
Bottle Size 70cl
